Class CommunityGarden

  • java.lang.Object
    • CommunityGarden

  • public class CommunityGarden
extends java.lang.Object
    A Community Garden is a collection of multiple plots of land. The total number of plots is not fixed.

    Each plot of land within a community garden has a unique identifier between 1 .. n where n can be determined by using the getTotalPlots() method.



    If the specific constructor is called with "Duke Garden" as the argument, some plots of land will be automatically created for this garden.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CommunityGarden(java.lang.String name)
      If this specific constructor is called with "Duke Garden" as the argument, a CommunityGarden object named Duke Garden will be created with some plots of land automatically created in this garden.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Gets the number of land plots with area greater or equal to the specifiedArea
      Plot getPlot(int plotNumber)
      Gets the specified plot of land identified by plotNumber in this community garden
      int getTotalPlots()
      Gets the total number of land plots in this community garden.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • CommunityGarden

        public CommunityGarden(java.lang.String name)
        If this specific constructor is called with "Duke Garden" as the argument, a CommunityGarden object named Duke Garden will be created with some plots of land automatically created in this garden. If the constructor is called with any argument other than "Duke Garden" no plots of land will be created.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the community garden

    • Method Detail

      • addPlot

        public void addPlot(int length,
                    int breadth)
        Adds a plot of land with the specified dimension into this community garden.
        Parameters:
        length - the length of the plot
        breadth - the breadth of the plot

      • getNumPlotsWithAreaGreaterOrEqualTo

        public int getNumPlotsWithAreaGreaterOrEqualTo(int specifiedArea)
        Gets the number of land plots with area greater or equal to the specifiedArea
        Parameters:
        specifiedArea - the area to be compared with
        Returns:
        the number of land plots that matches the criteria. 0 if none matches.

      • getTotalPlots

        public int getTotalPlots()
        Gets the total number of land plots in this community garden.
        Returns:
        the number of land plots

      • getPlot

        public Plot getPlot(int plotNumber)
        Gets the specified plot of land identified by plotNumber in this community garden
        Parameters:
        plotNumber - the identifier of the land plot (1 .. n) where n is the number of land plots in this community garden using the getTotalPlots() method.
        Returns:
        the Plot object if exists. Otherwise, return null.
